an10.84:2.4: BB translates “flustered” evidently accepting vijina and the admittedly dubious meaning of vijina. But I can’t see any justification for that. It seems to me that following the unusual term irina we have another unusual term vipina, both of which are more or less synonyms: a wilderness, forest, etc. http://sanskritdictionary.com/?iencoding=iast&q=vipina&lang=sans&action=Search The implication isn’t so much that they get emotionally upset, but that they “get stuck or lose their way”.
